## Contributing

All PDS Interop projects are open-source and community-friendly. Any contribution is welcome! 
For more details read the [contribution guidelines][contributing].

All PDS Interop projects adhere to [the Code Manifesto][code-manifesto] as its [code-of-conduct][code-of-conduct]. Contributors are expected to abide by its terms.

For a list of changes, see the [GitHub releases page][releases-link].

## License

This project is created by PDS Interop and licensed under a [European Union Public License 1.2][license-link] or later (EUPL-1.2).
